## Matrix.FromArrayToRef() method

Copy the content of an array into a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArrayToRef(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset: number, result: Matrix): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | defines the source array |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines an offset in the source array |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
